title: Manager Operations Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Uplift in May 2022
Interview Descriptions: Met one on one with 2 people on the leadership team and one department head. The process was seamless and felt very informed of next steps throughout my interview process.
Interview Questions: Questions around start-up experience, project management skills, and a take home case study

title: Data Science Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Uplift in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was substituted with a data science challenge. We were given a dataset and variables to analyze the data. Free to use machine learning models but not required to.

title: Substitute Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Uplift (Dallas, TX) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied and received an email within a month for a phone interview. the phone interview was not a typical interview. The questions were based on more of experience and handle things  when the unexpected happened. Over all the interviewer was really nice and I felt comfortable. She answer all of my questions.
Interview Questions:
What would you do if you came in a class with no lesson plan?
Name a time things didn't go as planned?
What made you want to work in education?

title: Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Uplift in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Phone Interview where you will be asked a series of questions based on your personality. Be prepared to know about the organization. Also be energetic it helps! After phone interview it will be in person interview where questions will be similar to phone interview.
